title.rendered: SSHS Drama Club Presents “Little Women” on November 15 & 16

content.rendered:
Join the Saratoga Springs High School Drama Club for their 2024 fall production of Little Women, adapted by Kate Hamill from Louisa May Alcott’s beloved novel. Performances will take place on November 15 and 16 at 7:30 p.m. in the Lowenberg Auditorium.

Tickets are $10 for adults and $7 for students and seniors at the door.  Don’t miss this timeless story brought to life by our talented students!
